ygData.subject: Usage of Logger for org.archive.modules.credentials.HtmlFormCredential
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi I have some question about logging information. I want to see the result of HtmlFormCredential (the call logger.severe( ) ), how do I configure that this

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Hi

I have some question about logging information.

I want to see the resu=
lt of HtmlFormCredential (the call logger.severe("") ), how do I configure =
that this information is logged?


Logs references to=A0http://logging.apac=
he.org/log4j/=A0that uses xml-format for the use of logging.
The example of=
 configuration file in heritrix (.../conf/logging.properties) do not use xm=
l-format.

If I want to see logs of HtmlFormCredential, should I then add t=
his in .../conf/logging.properties
org.archive.modules.credentials.HtmlForm=
Credential.level =3D FINEST ?
=A0
Best regards
Ulf
